data.eml:eml: Additions to the leafhopper genus Mimotettix (Hemiptera, Cicadellidae, Deltocephalinae) from Yunnan Province, China

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Wei, Xingtao, Xing, Jichun (2018): Additions to the leafhopper genus Mimotettix (Hemiptera, Cicadellidae, Deltocephalinae) from Yunnan Province, China. ZooKeys 786: 129-138, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.786.26402, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.786.26402
